projectParagraphs: Designed and developed an online ordering platform for all of our clients that launched the day after COVID lockdown ended. Â£5+ illion in revenue since launch.
Offering To table, Delivery and Collection, Customisable skins for each client, and the ability to tie into their stock and inventory systems.
Designed and built from scratch using web sockets and integrating accross multiple backend systems. This market leading KDS system had a fully customisable and flexible design.
It's flexibility allowed clients to use TV's and iPads as screens, and the customisability allowed Kobas to sell the solution to many types of hospitality businesses
Designed and built a custom quote builder machine for the sales reps at building matierials to be able to build orders over the phone and adjust pricing on the fly.
Built in react and using pagination and performant search technology it increased the workflow of the sales team over 3x times, leading to a multi year partnership.
Created a customised 'Beauty Match Maker' quiz to promote engagement on the site and allow for customers to filter the products they needed.
This in turn increased engagement and created much more click throguh and purchases. An example of scoping alongside the client to build something that has lasted
